title: ICMR Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 28 Scientist B Posts
description: The Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 28 Scientist B Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS can apply for the ICMR Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and...
